item.description:
下午6点到晚上8点

The event series Mandarin Conversation in Longwood Medical Area 下午6点到晚上8点 has been cancelled. Please update your plans accordingly.

If you have further questions, you can email me through the Contact Us link on Meetup.

This Mandarin chat at HSPH has been CANCELED because attendance was slim, and the appeal to several interested Meetups for a native Mandarin speaker or two or three to assume HOSTING responsibilities fell on deaf ears.


I cannot schedule the time to UNIQUELY host this recurring, weekly event.

Thank you for your consideration.

E-Mail LMA_Mandarin@YMail.com to discuss restoring this meetup event.

下午6点到晚上8点3
item.how_to_find_us: Have you completed the diplomatic measures required for you to have building access the night of the event?

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group
